title: Top tips for going into the second year of a Sociology course with Kate Flatley
description:
In this episode, Kate Flatley gives her top 5 tips (plus a bonus) of how to be successful in the second year of a Sociology course. It is important to keep reviewing your work from year 1 and hit the ground running, Kate even suggests listening to The Sociology show podcast!

You can follow Kate's YouTube channel here - https://www.youtube.com/c/TheTEACHERSOCIOLOGY
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
